name: Great Planes Aviation
about: At Great Planes Aviation, we are dedicated to shaping the future of aviation by nurturing the aspirations of tomorrow's pilots. Our Pilot Academy offers a comprehensive range of training programs, including the Pro-Pilot Track, Custom Track, and Accelerated Flight Training, all designed to transform aviation enthusiasts into fully licensed commercial pilots. With a strong emphasis on ground school education and hands-on training, our students benefit from highly experienced and FAA-certified flight instructors. We provide clean, updated aircraft and a full-service FAA-licensed maintenance department at the Rochester International Airport. Our commitment to precision, safety, and reliability makes us more than just a flying school; we are a partner in your aviation journey. Join us to turn your aspirations into reality.
